subject: Add dual input view: Form and Table modes
body:
Implemented a new table view option for input parameters alongside the existing form view:

Features:
- View toggle buttons to switch between Form and Table views
- Single model table: displays all parameters in a structured table with Parameter/Value/Unit/Description columns
- Multi-model comparison table: side-by-side parameter comparison across selected models
- Real-time synchronization between form and table inputs
- Table view automatically updates when models are selected/deselected
- View toggle only shown in forward calculator mode with selected models

Benefits:
- Power users can quickly edit parameters in spreadsheet-style interface
- Easy comparison of input differences across multiple models
- Efficient bulk parameter adjustments
- Copy-paste support from external spreadsheets
- Beginner-friendly form view remains the default with hints and guidance

Files modified:
- index.html: Added view toggle UI and table container
- app.js: Implemented table generation, view switching, and input synchronization
- README.md: Added documentation for table view feature and usage guide
- claude.md: Updated feature list to include dual input views
